title: Remiscoin5
author: Remiscoin5
content: Our president Mohammed buhari is above court order. What is the good example that our leaders are showing? They make us feel that nobody have the right and power to question their order Nigeria is the giant of Africa but no good example they are showing other African country are now better than Nigeria. What type of country are we. youths election is coming nobody should deceive you vote for the right person that will move Nigeria forward
